name: Inhabit
description:
You wake up. You’ve barely left your room in days, your place is a mess. You've neglected any form of self care for over a week. But today is different! Today’s the day you finally get something done.

Make your way around your home and surrounding areas, practicing healthy habits and exploring the world in this short open ended slice of life puzzle game. You may even make some friends along the way!


Find balance in your life!
Your house is in shambles! Wake up, and get to work. Build some good habits by doing these daily activities, with each chore being represented by a different unique set of puzzles.



Hang out with Pals!
As you complete more puzzles, the personalities of the chore manifest in real life! You can just hang out with your buds as much as you want now. Invite them to come hang out anywhere in the house!



Fix up your home!
After each chore, you’ll finally be able to clear up your home, unlocking new secrets! After you finish gardening, you can cut bushes. After cleaning the house, trash bags pose no problem!



Relax in your backyard!
Just vibe with your buds in beautiful nostalgic pixel art, with an acoustic soundtrack by the artist Tom Dron! Birds fly past, you can hear a creek in the distance, your friend makes a joke about daffodils. As the day passes, the music and ambience change to reflect the time.



Pet a dog!
Lots of cute things to interact with! That dog isnt going to pet itself. As you explore the area around your home, you’ll find more objects, animals, and locations to hang out with!




Enjoy this calm, wholesome experience as you transform your home and your mind into a place you'd like to inhabit!
